long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Earn money while browsing the web. Gain control and contribute to the creation of a better, more dignified internet.
Earn money while surfing the web and helping researchers to learn more about users behaviour on the web.

A passive income that does not necessitate any lifestyle modifications.

As you surf, the Data2money extension captures, pools, and distributes your data (don't worry, it doesn't gather any of your private information! ), then returns a fair share of bonuses to you!
